title: FS - 2 T206s***Westlake Sl'er & Seymour - Closing on ebay tonight!!***
author: wolf441

posts.post_title: FS - 2 T206s***Westlake Sl'er & Seymour - Closing on ebay tonight!!***
posts.post_content:
Up for sale are the following T206's. Paypal F&F preferred. All prices include shipping. Really looking to move these, Please PM if interested.

T206 HOF Vic Willis Pitching - $SOLD
T206 SL Westlake - ebay
T206 Seymour Portrait - ebay


Thanks for looking,

Steve
C'mon, a T206 HOFer, a SLer and a common, all for $70!!?? What a great holiday gift for some lucky collector!! :D
IM/PM sent with offer for all.

[quote name="wolf441" post=1215686]C'mon, a T206 HOFer, a SLer and a common, all for $70!!?? What a great holiday gift for some lucky collector!! :D[/QUOTE]

Agree.  It's a very good price.  I honestly don't need these cards...but if no-one wants 'em I might just buy them anyway :)

Best,
Scott

[quote name="scottglevy" post=1216062]Agree.  It's a very good price.  I honestly don't need these cards...but if no-one wants 'em I might just buy them anyway :)

Best,
Scott[/QUOTE]

Thanks Scott,

I appreciate the kind words. I'm going to keep them out there at $70/BO for the remainder of the day and then will reluctantly throw them on ebay if no one wants them here.

Take it easy,

Steve
Final price reductions before throwing these on ebay!!

Willis sold. Take home Westlake & Seymour for $35. Thanks for looking!

Steve
Prices reduced on the remaining two.
Bump for insanely low holiday prices!!!
Willis arrived in the mail today, promptly shipped and great job on packing the card.  Thanks!

Thanks Scott!

FYI to all, the Westlake and Seymour are closing on ebay tonight.
